name: listed
desc: Saving this job for later. Have not applied yet.

name: applying
desc: in the process of writing a cover letter or application for this job

name: first contact
desc: a phone screen, and email, etc, which may result in further interview process. Skip if the first contact is a an in-person interview or is more substantial than a phone screen.

name: second contact
desc: an in-person interview or some equally substantial contact

name: third contact
desc: Some other form of contact that occurs after a second contact. It may be helpful to write notes in such a case.

name: no contact
desc: Some time has passed since application without contact (two months or more), and the listing may or may not have been updated.

name: expired
desc: The listing expired before you could apply
